waypoints.onload: player:mount() __WPL:setWaypointIndex(1) -- Because otherwise it might start at the wrong WP
waypoints.waypoint: player:target_Object(110055); -- Agnes CompleteQuestByName(420068) -- A Bit Worrying
player:target_Object(110051); -- Highly-skilled Doctor CompleteQuestByName(420075) -- Gathering Spider Venom yrest(2000) inventory:useItem(222007) -- Reagent Ring

player:target_Object(110057); -- Gil local reward = 1 if player.MaxMana > 0 then reward = 2 end CompleteQuestByName(420093, reward); -- Strange Request AcceptQuestByName(420094) -- Not Your Grandmother's Soup
player:target_Object(110052); -- Dell CompleteQuestByName(420094); -- Not Your Grandmother's Soup AcceptQuestByName(420486) -- A beautiful Necklace
